metadata.symbol: Written Works by A. Roberto Coronado
metadata.description:
This is my first NFT and I’m releasing it in celebration of PRIDE Month!!

The Infinite Moment was written back in 1995. It captures a snapshot in time dealing with feelings and emotions about my desires for a first sexual encounter, which in my case are same-sex oriented. During the early 90s, the situation was improving for the LGBTQ community, but there was still much room for improvement. So, this poem captures a bit of the fear, anxiety and isolation that I felt as a result of the feelings I harbored towards men. The poem was born at a time when I began to believe, maybe I really CAN be myself!  I’m hoping the poem will resonate with the reader and bring you a certain level of comfort and understanding of your own emotions. If it does, then we’ve shared a sweet experience, and you’ve taken a peek into my world…at least as it was 26 years ago! :D Peace and Love!!!  —ARC

NOTE: The Infinite Moment NFT encompasses the following digital files that can be extracted from a downloadable zip file:

a. the “Rough Draft” in JPG and PDF formats. What's special: It's the original hand-written document.

b. the “Original First Printing” in JPG and PDF formats. What's special: It's the original first printing of the document, and it has my original signature in green felt marker.

c. HQ version of the “2021 Printing" in JPG and PDF formats. What's special: It's a modern printing on a single page with added images.

d. A four minute video of the author reading the poem.

e. A 6.5 minute video of the author discussing the poem’s history and creation of the NFT.

f. A PDF document which details the rights reserved by the author/NFT creator and the rights granted to the NFT buyer(s). NOTE: The Mintable website won't allow me to upload this document for preview, so please feel free to request a PDF copy if you're curious to know what's in it. It's fairly generous when it comes to granting rights, but I do retain copyright ownership. It DOES allow the buyer to benefit commercially from the NFT. In addition, it allows for the purchase of the 3 original physical copies that exist: the rough draft, the original first printing, and the 2021 printing.
metadata.title: The Infinite Moment NFT
